images.copyright: Vernal Fall in Yosemite National Park, California, USA (© elvistudio/Shutterstock)
images.title: In full flow
images.caption: Yosemite in full flow
images.desc: This spectacular scene is Vernal Fall in Yosemite National Park, in the US state of California. At this time of year, the waterfall flows in a torrent over the edge of this cliff, but by late summer it can be reduced to a trickle of small streams. Vernal Fall is usually at full power by May, as the spring thaw in the mountains melts the snowpack, which becomes a raging tumble of water as it makes its way to the valley floor.
